feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In a conversation between Andreas Schildbach and Roy, it was mentioned that there have been no complaints from Bitcoin Wallet's users regarding the mBTC switch. In contrast, many questions are raised if exchange rates differ by more than 10%. It is believed that most Bitcoin users are familiar with SI units and their prefixes, although this may not be true for the general population.
